## MapBy type

\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\* HELPER TYPES \*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type MapBy<
  T extends any[] | undefined,
  FIELD extends keyof TupleToUnion<T>
> = {
  [key in TupleToUnion<T>[FIELD]]: Extract<
    TupleToUnion<T>,
    {
      [exc in FIELD]: key;
    }
  >;
};
```
